entries.content:
Many discographies list this as 05 January 1952, Metropolitan Opera House, New York City. An article on [TDWAW](http://tdwaw.ellingtonweb.ca/MetropolitanOperaHouse19520105.html) explains why this is unlikely and is the source of the date and location here.

Note also that Fancy Dan DE5201m has previously been listed but does not exist.

entries.title: Do Nothin' Till You Hear From Me - vJG

entries.content: There are two broadcast recordings circulating; the former is containing the 4 titles listed in ellingtonia (and NDESOR) and dated generically Sep '52, the latter, dated 17 September 1952, contains 9 titles. It can be found at https://pastdaily.com/2014/12/21/duke-ellington-and-his-orchestra-live-from-cleveland-1952-past-daily-downbeat/ Among the 9 selections, there are the same 4 titles of the first recording, listening suggests strongly that these common titles are identical recordings (with different pitch/speed).
